attributes.action: stop deleting petitions on this website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is absolutely ridiculous that a website such as this will allow only petitions that 'fit' to certain criteria.

For example, attempt to create a petition that touches upon the subjects of race or nationality and you will fail. Repeatedly.

If a petition is seemingly offensive or inciteful, then surely it will fail to receive support and flounder helplessly. This is a true definition of TOLERANCE and democracy.

A faceless administrator deciding what can and cannot be displayed just isn't cricket.

Sign this petition to allow REAL democracy to happen.

rejection.details: Comments on the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
